thread.title: John Johnson
thread.title_full: Tax Tiger reviewed by John Johnson

author: John Johnson
title: John Johnson
text: I had a problem with a 10k plus tax payment that I owed to the IRS. I called them and they had me talking to a lawyer in no time. Although I felt that the payments were a bit high I had to reconsider my thoughts. Would I rather deal with the IRS on my own or get help from someone that was used to dealing with them? I paid the fee which was done in 10 installments and they got the IRS to settle with me for $200.00. I would definitely recommend Tax Tiger to anyone who has a problem with the IRS. Thanks again to Brenton Schick and all the wonderful at Tax Tiger !
